content.text:
# 1968 Country Music Association Awards

The 1968 Country Music Association Awards, 2nd Ceremony, was held on November 20, 1968, at the Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, Tennessee, and was hosted by Dale Evans and Roy Rogers.
Winners and nominees
Winners in Bold.
{| class="wikitable"
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Entertainer of the Year
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Album of the Year
|-
| valign="top" |
* Glen Campbell
** Eddy Arnold
** Johnny Cash
** Merle Haggard
** Charley Pride
| valign="top" |
* 'At Folsom Prison — Johnny Cash'
** By the Time I Get to Phoenix — Glen Campbell
** D-I-V-O-R-C-E — Tammy Wynette
** Gentle on My Mind — Glen Campbell
** The Best of Merle Haggard — Merle Haggard
